name: Ironsight
detailed_description:
Ironsight is a free-to-play first-person shooter set in a dystopian future where two mercenary factions arose in the wake of an environmental catastrophe. Players are offered multiple ways to customize their gameplay, all of which are available directly or unlockable via playing.

Join the war and fight on an abandoned airport, a cruise ship, in a secret lab and many other exciting locations!


The game features a highly dynamic gameplay which rewards both aggressive and tactical approaches: Run into the enemy and capitalize on your reflexes or find a zone to defend. The choice is yours!

The map design and options in accessories, weapons and drones compliment all styles and ensure that there is never a dull moment!


Ironsight offers a wide array of familiar modern weapons and customization with a range of unlockable high-tech sights and accessories. Game play can be further customized via drones and skills, all of which are available from the very start!

Ironsight offers options for players of all styles!

- 10+ Maps
- Different Modes: From Team Death Match to Search & Destroy
- Hundreds of Weapons and customization options
- 15+ drones
- 10+ Skills
- 10+ Elite Mercenaries
- A fully customizable Mercenary: Neil Wild

short_description: Ironsight is a first-person shooter featuring intense action and a wide variety of customization. Gameplay options are available either directly or unlockable via playing. Enter the competitive action on your terms and dominate the enemy!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo E7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 9600 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
